meta.data_set_description: Employment and education history is the initial point of judgement in modern career exploration. I wanted to challenge myself to put a personal spin on displaying this data. With the purpose of highlighting (1) how this type of summarizing a person can be inadequate, (2) communicating private information publicly without divulging in entirety, (3) examples of conversation inducing line items.

data.title: Family Owned Restaurant & Resort
data.description: Growing up in a family owned business meant filling every role as necessary. Restaurant: Busboy, Waiter, and Cook. Motel: Maintenance and Housekeeping. Primarily summers for the restaurant, summer and some winters for the motel, maintenance year round.

data.title: Engineering Learning Center
data.description: University Tutor. Support engineering students in Statics, Dynamics, Mechanics of Materials, and Thermodynamics.

data.title: R&D Machine Shop
data.description: Intern, Co-op, Full-time Machinist. Filled various roles in a small team for a contract-based research and development of machining and cutting technologies. Proficient on 3 and 4 axis manual/CNC lathes and mills (conversational code, G-Code written or generated), trained on all standard shop equipment and various testing apparatuses (fluid and solid mechanics).

data.title: Industry Leading Engine Manufacturer (R&D)
data.description: Co-op, Design Analysis. Computational Analysis: component and system level performance prediction and optimization using multiple codes and validation techniques. Coupling codes, developing new computation routines, real world validation, analysis workflow development and management (identifying a need, process planning, bringing new tools in-house, developing the analysis workflow, data processing, communicating results, process review). Project based application of analysis to drive design decisions.

data.title: Industry Leading Engine Manufacturer (R&D)
data.description: Senior Engineer, Mechanical Development. Systems Lead: Responsible for ensuring the product meets performance targets within program schedules. Assembling the necessary teams to guide product design through performance prediction and validation. Reporting results in both working and program level environments.

data.title: Industry Leading Engine Manufacturer (R&D)
data.description: Principal Engineer, Mechanical Development. Systems Lead: Responsible for ensuring the product meets performance targets within program schedules. Assembling the necessary teams to guide product design through performance prediction and validation. Reporting results in both working and program level environments.

data.title: Industry Leading Engine Manufacturer (CX)
data.description: Principal Engineer, Diagnostic Intelligence. Responsible for working with cross-functional stakeholders to evaluate and apply ML and AI technologies by leveraging our data warehousing system. Building and delivering foundational descriptive data sets and dashboard, extending descriptive data sets to predictive analysis with business impact.

data.title: Parental Home Teachings
data.description: The effects of the environment you were raised in cannot be overstated, recognizing this is (in my opinion) a crucial step in understanding an individual's thoughts, beliefs, and achievements.

data.title: Indirect Computer Learning
data.description: Our first home computer. Originally purchased with the intent of managing the family business, quickly turned into my means to connect with the internet from our rural location. Indirectly developed the ability to use it as a means to solve problems.

data.title: Direct Computer Learning
data.description: The computer (leveraged with the internet) is the ultimate means of accessing knowledge, I try to push the bounds of this statement on a daily basis.
